definition: to do sth in place of sb else
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Is there anything else I could do for you while you wait?
sentences.chinese: 您等候时，还有其他要代劳吗？

sentences.english: Well, the Penguin Tea Timer happily does the waiting for you.
sentences.chinese: 现在企鹅泡茶定时器可以帮你代劳啦。

sentences.english: If I can be of any service during your convalescence, be sure to let me know.
sentences.chinese: 在你康复期间，我如能代劳的事，务必告知。

sentences.english: This measure may preclude the exclusive agency from selling crucial crude oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个措施可以使专有的代劳代理不克出售抉择的原油。

sentences.english: Since he can't put his ideas over clearly enough, allow me to speak on his behalf.
sentences.chinese: 他不能清楚地表达自己的想法，所以，就让我代劳吧。

sentences.english: Haiti can’t be reconstructed by well-meaning outsiders.
sentences.chinese: 海地重建不能由好心的局外人代劳。

sentences.english: If our delegate is unable to attend, we shall have to call on his deputy's services.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们的代表不能出席，我们就请他的副手代劳。

sentences.english: The rest of the time their mothers or wives do it for them.
sentences.chinese: 其余时间则由母亲或妻子代劳。

definition: lit. to go beyond the sacrificial altar and take over the kitchen (idiom); fig. to exceed one's place and meddle in other people's affairs/to take matters into one's own hands
to do (sth) oneself/to help oneself to
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to make a decision/to make up one's mind
to decide/to make decisions/to take responsibility (for deciding)/to be in charge/to give sb justice
to take a lot of trouble (over sb or sth)/may I trouble you (to do sth)
to have more work than one can deal with/to have one's hands full
to look after/to attend to/to have in care
to take care of a matter all by oneself/to run the whole show
to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
